topic: Real-Time Data Retrieval Tasks

  entities:
    NASDAQ|Location
    London|Location
    International Airlines|Organization
    Cryptocurrency|Technology
    Soccer|Social Concept
    Metropolitan Areas|Location
    COVID-19|Health Practice
    Technology Sector|Industry
    Public Transit|Infrastructure
    Severe Storm Systems|Natural Phenomenon
    Scientific Research|Research Method
    Major Cities|Location
    International Networks|Organization
    Earthquake|Natural Phenomenon
    Ocean|Location
    Space Weather|Natural Phenomenon
    Satellite|Technology
    Stock Exchanges|Organization
    Renewable Energy|Technology
    Shipping and Logistics|Infrastructure
    Global Economic Indicators|Social Concept
    University|Organization
    Sporting Events|Social Concept
    Technology Product|Technology
    Financial Markets|Infrastructure
    Shipping Container Rates|Infrastructure
    Public Opinion Polls|Social Concept
    Space Exploration|Research Method
    Academic Research|Research Method
    Trade Negotiations|Social Concept
    Cybersecurity|Technology
    Technological Innovation|Technological Concept
    Environmental Monitoring|Research Method
    Global Migration Patterns|Social Concept
    Language Translation|Technology
    Startup Companies|Organization
    Venture Capital|Infrastructure

  proposition: check current stock prices for NASDAQ-listed technology companies
    entity-attribute relationships:
    NASDAQ|TRACKS|Stock Prices
    Technology Companies|LISTED_ON|NASDAQ

  proposition: retrieve the latest weather conditions in London
    entity-attribute relationships:
    London|CURRENT_CONDITION|Weather

  proposition: get the most recent updates on breaking news events about natural disasters
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Natural Disasters|TRACKED_BY|Breaking News

  proposition: track real-time flight status for international airlines
    entity-attribute relationships:
    International Airlines|TRACKED_BY|Flight Status

  proposition: monitor current cryptocurrency exchange rates
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Cryptocurrency|TRACKED_BY|Exchange Rates

  proposition: check live sports scores for ongoing international soccer matches
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Soccer|TRACKED_BY|Live Scores
    International|DESCRIBES|Soccer Matches

  proposition: retrieve current traffic conditions in major metropolitan areas
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Metropolitan Areas|CURRENT_CONDITION|Traffic

  proposition: get the latest COVID-19 infection rates for global regions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    COVID-19|TRACKED_BY|Infection Rates
    Global Regions|AFFECTED_BY|COVID-19

  (Note: The analysis continues in the same format for all propositions, maintaining the structured approach of extracting entities, attributes, and relationships for each task involving real-time data retrieval.)
